headline: Atmos Energy (NYSE:ATO) Secures US$3 Billion Credit Extension Until 2030
summary: Atmos Energy (NYSE:ATO) has seen a price increase of nearly 12% over the last quarter, a noteworthy contrast to the broader market, which has recently experienced a decline of around 6%. The company's extension of its revolving credit facilities, each valued at $1.5 billion, with maturity dates extended up to 2030, played a crucial role. Additionally, Atmos Energy reported robust Q1 earnings, with net income climbing to $352 million. This performance is particularly impressive given the...

headline: Buy 5 Low-Beta High-Yielding Stocks Amid Trump Tariffs and Market Rout
summary: Five low-beta stocks with high dividend yield look attractive at current market scenario. These are: ATO, WEC, EXC, CMS, CNP.
